title: net/http: default User-Agent is invalid
body:
The [default User-Agent](http://golang.org/src/net/http/request.go#L336)

    Go 1.1 package http

in the http package doesn't appear to be valid according to the [User-Agent section of RFC 7231](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7231#section-5.5.3).

Go should have a properly formatted User-Agent. e.g.

    Go-http/1.1
